an5.287-292:1.1: “A nun … trainee nun … novice monk … novice nun … layman … laywoman … with five qualities is placed in hell as if delivered there.
an5.287-292:1.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and consume beer, wine, and liquor intoxicants.
an5.287-292:1.4: With these five qualities they’re placed in hell as if delivered there.
an5.287-292:2.1: A nun … trainee nun … novice monk … novice nun … layman … laywoman … with five qualities is placed in heaven as if delivered there.
an5.287-292:2.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or consume beer, wine, and liquor intoxicants.
an5.287-292:2.4: With these five qualities they’re placed in heaven as if delivered there.”
